channel.title: Python on Nick's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Nick's Blog

item.title: Minecraft Pic
item.description: I made a python script that takes your webcam’s pixels, converts them to Minecraft blocks, then passes them to a datapack that places the blocks in your Minecraft’s world! Here is an example: It maps each pixel color in the webcam to a concrete color in Minecraft. It was quite fun to build and a nice weekend project!
